title: Variable Types Concept Map
description: Interactive hierarchical concept map showing the classification of variables in statistics. Variables branch into Categorical and Quantitative, with Quantitative further divided into Discrete and Continuous. Features hover tooltips with definitions and examples, and click-to-highlight branch functionality.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Statistics
Data Types
Variable Classification
Categorical Data
Quantitative Data

interactivity.hover: Shows definition and examples for each node
interactivity.click: Highlights the branch containing the selected node
